document_data.mainbody:
The Coast Way crossing was a point where the Coast Way crossed the Winding Water.
The crossing was located some ways east of the Coast Way forest.
In the , Auchlin Deepvein undertook a dig at the site of the crossing. His efforts were thwarted by a dwarf from Clan Coldhearth who had underwent lichdom.
During the War of the Shining Crusade the bridge at the crossing was destroyed by a panicked Shining Crusade mage. This disaster forced a contingent of Flaming Fist soldiers to reroute to Boareskyr Bridge in order rally with the rest of the Coalition forces.
* Sterling Silver Inn This cozy establishment was run by the halfling man Takos and his wife.
